title: 31 Healing Quotes To Inspire Your Meditation Practice
author: Barrie Davenport
description: Use these healing meditation quotes from this post to get more inspiration in your meditation practice.
cleaned_text: Are you thinking about starting a meditation practice? Or maybe you've established one and are looking for ways to enhance the experience. Either way, quotes about meditation are worth reading and contemplating. Not only can they psyche you up to do a long meditation session, but you can use some as healing meditations during your sessions. If this sounds right up your alley, get comfortable and [ pull up a chair](https://mindfulzen.co/meditation-chairs/) because we've made a list of short meditation quotes we know you'll love. 31 Healing Meditation Quotes to Inspire Your Practice Read through this list of positive healing meditation quotes and write down any that speak to you. Post the quotes where you can read them [before meditating](https://mindfulzen.co/bedtime-meditations/) to foster the best mindset for your practice. 1. "You should not be carried away by the dictation of the mind, but the mind should be carried by your dictation." — A.C Bhaktivedanta Swami 2. "Meditation is the discovery that the point of life is always arrived at in the immediate moment." — Alan Watts 4. "Suffering is due to our disconnection with the inner soul. Meditation is establishing that connection." — Amit Ray 5. "Silence is not an absence but a presence." — Anne D. LeClaire 6. "There are two mistakes one can make along the road to truth: not going all the way, and not starting." — Buddha 7. "Do not let the behavior of others destroy your [inner peace](https://mindfulzen.co/amethyst-affirmations/)." — Dalai Lama 10. "Meditation is the ultimate mobile device; you can use it anywhere, anytime, unobtrusively" - Sharon Salzberg 11. "Meditation is like a gym in which you develop the powerful mental muscles of calm and insight" - Ajahn Brahm 12. "Meditation connects you with your soul, and this connection gives you [access to your intuition](https://mindfulzen.co/intuition-vs-anxiety/), your heartfelt desires, your integrity, and the inspiration to create a life you love" - Sarah McLean 13. "Meditation is a wonderful way to free your mind from stress. With meditation, you transcend the mind" - Zane Baker 14. "Meditation is not evasion, it is a serene encounter with reality" - Thich Nhat Hanh 15. "Be here now. Be someplace else later. Is that so complicated?" — David M.
